comment.author: 59356005@N02
comment._content: Dr H K Banda Prime Minister then president of Malawi (in homburg hat)

comment.author: 28429873@N00
comment._content: At this time Dr Kamuzu Banda was PM of Malawi, not yet President. He was on a state visit to Tanganyika. Others on the picture include Kanyama Chiume, Foreign Minister of Malawi (holding a cane to the right of Banda); Julius Nyerere, PM of Tanganyika (holding a cane in the middle); and Oscar Kambona, Foreign Minister of Tanganyika (holding a cane to the right). Picture taken outside the HQ of TANU in Dar es Salaam on what is now Lumumba Street.
